com.fluidops.iwb.util
Interface Configurable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFlexProvider, AbstractXMLFlexProvider, AnnotationFrameworkBasedProvider, CkanProvider, CSVProvider, DataMappingProvider, ExternalProvider, FacebookLookupProvider, FileProvider, GoogleRefineProvider, RDFLookupProvider, RDFProvider, SampleAnnotationFrameworkBasedProvider, ScriptProvider, SequenceProvider, SilkProvider, SPARQLEndpointProvider, StatisticProvider, TableProvider, ValueBasedDataMappingProvider, WidgetConfig, XMLProvider
public interface Configurable

A configurable is something that can be configured. Currently Provider and WidgetConfig are the implementing classes. The actual purpose is to offer a unified configuration UI (like the ConfigurationForm for Widgets and Providers) for all kinds of configurable things

Author:
ango

Method Summary
 java.lang.Class<?> getConfigurablesClass()
          Get the class of the configurable.
 java.lang.Class<?> getConfigurationClass()
          Get the class of the configurable's config.
 

Method Detail

getConfigurablesClass

java.lang.Class<?> getConfigurablesClass()
Get the class of the configurable. In case of the widget config it's in the widget field of the config. In case of providers it's the class of the configurable

getConfigurationClass

java.lang.Class<?> getConfigurationClass()
Get the class of the configurable's config. It's the configClass of the instantiated widget or provider
